medical_history.chief_complaint: 4 days of abdominal pain, fevers, and malaise.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days ago, initially with general discomfort that worsened overnight. The patient reported feeling fatigued, sleeping the entire day, but felt better yesterday. Abdominal pain has become more localized in the right lower abdomen. Intermittent fevers, unrecorded, have been present since the onset. The patient has also experienced frequent urination without dysuria. Denies nausea, vomiting but has anorexia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension - diet-controlled; Chronic bilateral hearing loss - no formal diagnosis.
